creditline: Gift of the family of Lucas Van Hilst
description: beach landscape with families in color swimsuits walking along beach in foreground; sea in mid-distance, with sailboat at L; top 2/3 of image is gray and blue sky with flying gulls at C; white overmat
inscription: old cardboard backing: Lucas / Verified on Back / By Jan Ponstijn / (Exec. testam.) / (From \"Seaside 2\" back) / Anke Gray
text:
Having studied in Amsterdam and Paris, Dutch painter Leo Gestel was interested in international avant-garde artistic movements. He delved into Divisionism, Fauvism, Cubism, and Expressionism. At times he dealt with major events, such as the displacement of refugees during World War I, but more often he depicted everyday life.

Here, Gestel takes us to the beach, where gulls wheel in the sky as two families wade in the surf and a sailboat approaches.
title: Title unknown [Seaside 2]
